text:
Hey that’s really cool thx a mill <@UCJANAW1Y> :+1:

I will try it out in the codebase anyways but any ideas when it could be released to maven?
Hi all, i have an index page with dynamic pages and im getting those from HubDB, is there a way in the index page to filter them like `most resent`  and `most popular` ?
We've been working on Jinjava a lot recently so a release probably won't be too far down the line. I'd say we will probably release the next version in like a month

Hi, Is there a way to get the record from hubdb based on latitude and longitude around 50 miles on this page <https://thejuicycrab.net/order-page>. Also how to print all data after getting from hubdb table in hubl.
Check out this article from HS: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/lets-build-a-page-with-a-map-with-hubdb>

There are a couple of good functions / query parameters that should help you find the distance. Specifically the query `
```geo_distance(location," ~ request.query_dict['lat'] ~ "," ~ request.query_dict['lon'] ~ ",mi)__lt=1.0```
